tourGuide.service

Class TourGuideServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • tourGuide.service.TourGuideServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TourGuideService

    @Service
public class TourGuideServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements TourGuideService

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorServiceTourGuide
      A cachedThreadPool executorService so the necessary threads are automatically running and stopping.
      java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool forkJoinPool
      A ForkJoinPool used to invoke a RecursiveTask called CalculatingRewardsTask.
      static int USER_CONSUMER_COUNT
      A constant used to limit the number of threads working at the same time in the executorService when consuming visitedLocationQueue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TourGuideServiceImpl() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,gpsUtil.location.Location> getAllCurrentLocations()
      Get the current location for each user and returns the result in a hashmap.
      Tracker getTracker()
      Returns the service's tracker
      gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation getUserLocation(User user)
      Get a visitedLocation by user, either by getting its last visitedLocation in its visitedLocation's list (the list is updated all fifteen minutes by tracker), either by tracking the actual user's location (if its visitedLocation's list is empty).
      void initializeTourGuideService()
      Permit to start a new tracker which is tracking regularly all user's locations.
      UserCloseAttractionsInfo searchFiveClosestAttractions(gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation visitedLocation)
      Get the five closest attractions from a visitedLocation, whatever the distance, and return the user's location, and, for each attraction, its name, its location, the distance from the user's location and the reward points awarded for this attraction
      java.util.List<gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation> trackAllUsers(java.util.List<User> allUsers)
      Track the location of all the users in the given list, this method is used by the tracker.
      gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation trackUserLocation(User user)
      Track a user's location calling gpsUtilService and add it to its visitedLocation list, rewards are calculating calling rewardsService and added if applicable.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • executorServiceTourGuide

        public java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorServiceTourGuide
        A cachedThreadPool executorService so the necessary threads are automatically running and stopping.

      • forkJoinPool

        public java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool forkJoinPool
        A ForkJoinPool used to invoke a RecursiveTask called CalculatingRewardsTask.

      • USER_CONSUMER_COUNT

        public static final int USER_CONSUMER_COUNT
        A constant used to limit the number of threads working at the same time in the executorService when consuming visitedLocationQueue
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TourGuideServiceImpl

        public TourGuideServiceImpl()

    • Method Detail

      • initializeTourGuideService

        public void initializeTourGuideService()
        Permit to start a new tracker which is tracking regularly all user's locations. The function also add shutDownHook to permit closing tracker's executorService.
        Specified by:
        initializeTourGuideService in interface TourGuideService

      • getTracker

        public Tracker getTracker()
        Returns the service's tracker
        Specified by:
        getTracker in interface TourGuideService
        Returns:
        the tracker attached to this class

      • getUserLocation

        public gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation getUserLocation(User user)
        Get a visitedLocation by user, either by getting its last visitedLocation in its visitedLocation's list (the list is updated all fifteen minutes by tracker), either by tracking the actual user's location (if its visitedLocation's list is empty).
        Specified by:
        getUserLocation in interface TourGuideService
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose location is sought
        Returns:
        actual user location if its list of visitedLocation is empty otherwise its last visitedLocation

      • trackUserLocation

        public gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation trackUserLocation(User user)
        Track a user's location calling gpsUtilService and add it to its visitedLocation list, rewards are calculating calling rewardsService and added if applicable.
        Specified by:
        trackUserLocation in interface TourGuideService
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose location is tracked
        Returns:
        the actual user VisitedLocation

      • searchFiveClosestAttractions

        public UserCloseAttractionsInfo searchFiveClosestAttractions(gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation visitedLocation)
                                                      throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Get the five closest attractions from a visitedLocation, whatever the distance, and return the user's location, and, for each attraction, its name, its location, the distance from the user's location and the reward points awarded for this attraction
        Specified by:
        searchFiveClosestAttractions in interface TourGuideService
        Parameters:
        visitedLocation - a VisitedLocation object
        Returns:
        a UserCloseAttractionsInfo object containing all information about the five closest locations
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException - when the user is not found by its id

      • getAllCurrentLocations

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,gpsUtil.location.Location> getAllCurrentLocations()
        Get the current location for each user and returns the result in a hashmap. The current location is returned by the function getUserLocation, which returns the last VisitedLocation if there is one (its actualised all fifteen minutes) or track the location if there is not any VisitedLocation registered
        Specified by:
        getAllCurrentLocations in interface TourGuideService
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing all the users' id as key and all their location as value

      • trackAllUsers

        public java.util.List<gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation> trackAllUsers(java.util.List<User> allUsers)
        Track the location of all the users in the given list, this method is used by the tracker. It uses the forkJoinPool and a LinkedBlockingQueue to run threads concurrently, so the function is faster and permit tracking 100 000 users in about 10 minutes
        Specified by:
        trackAllUsers in interface TourGuideService
        Parameters:
        allUsers - the user list containing all users to track
        Returns:
        a list of all the visitedLocation tracked
